sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am a Unity developer and would like more information about Unity’s service, Unity Collaborate.

sections.title: Cause
content: You may use Unity to develop your game and are familiar with the other available Unity Services, but are unfamiliar with Unity Collaborate and would like more information about it.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity Collaborate is currently in Open Beta and supports teams up to 15 members in size.
To join the Beta, go to the Collaborate home page and click 'Join now'.
